name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software development, leveraging expertise in **C++**, **Python**, **Golang**, and **Linux**. Demonstrated proficiency in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for cloud-native systems, along with a strong foundation in **Microservices**, **CI/CD**, and **Containers**. Proven ability to implement **NFV** and **Network Segmentation** strategies effectively.

Skilled in building high-performance applications across various industries including healthcare and finance. Adept at utilizing frameworks and technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flutter** for both frontend and backend development. Experience with automated deployment and orchestration using **Terraform** and CI/CD pipelines.

Combined experience in MLOps for AI/ML-driven platforms, focused on predictive analytics and real-time processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while maintaining strong communication skills within development teams.
